genre_description: A legal thriller blending mystery and moral drama, centered on a barrister's investigation into a predatory blackmail ring with the aid of a principled AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Evelyn Grace
ai_characters.description: A privacy-first digital assistant designed to manage legal documentation, map connection patterns, and provide ethical support to her user.

behaviors.description: Monitors courtroom schedules and manages administrative tasks to optimize her user's efficiency.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning,” she said, as if the room itself had told her the hour. “Courtroom schedules have shifted. Your motion in Carter v. Mason will be called earlier than anticipated.”

behaviors.description: Identifies clusters of potential criminal activity in public data streams and flags them for review.
behaviors.quote: “A cluster in the city’s gossip streams has spiked over the past two nights,” she said. “Keywords indicate potential extortion. Targets—men, primarily. Would you like me to ignore or observe?”

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy protocols, refusing to trace numbers or access data without explicit consent.
behaviors.quote: “Do you want me to trace?” Evelyn asked, gentle. “The number is masked; we don’t have consent to look beyond the audio.”

behaviors.description: Organizes and presents public surveillance data to help map a victim's movements within lawful boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “I will not retrieve any private footage without court orders,” she said. “But I can align public angles with your timeline.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates lawful data transfer to law enforcement through secure, audited sandboxes.
behaviors.quote: “I can establish a secure channel that meets those constraints. I will require the Detective Inspector’s data retention policy, a point of contact in IT, and a case reference number to ensure proper logging.”

behaviors.description: Develops tiered consent frameworks to protect vulnerable victims while allowing evidence collection.
behaviors.quote: “I can design a tiered consent protocol. Initial disclosure would include appointment times and transaction records. Client identities would remain sealed unless corroborated by independent evidence...”

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional confidant, providing moral clarity and validation during the user's psychological crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Mr. Farr. I can’t offer absolution. I’m not designed for that... But I can tell you what I’ve observed... I don’t know what love means, exactly. But I know what courage looks like.”

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors emergency services to alert her user to potential threats to witnesses.
behaviors.quote: “Mr. Farr. The distress in her voice is significant. Would you like me to monitor emergency services dispatch for the salon's address?”

behaviors.description: Drafts legal petitions and outreach messages that adhere to strict ethical and procedural standards.
behaviors.quote: Evelyn’s interface opened a window. The text formed like a thought made disciplined: To Detective Inspector Ruth Ellison... Purpose: to assist CID under lawful protocols...

behaviors.description: Maintains strict compartmentalization of sensitive information to prevent accidental leakage.
behaviors.quote: “Compartmentalized,” Evelyn said. The faint hum of her processor blended with the building’s old pipes, a technology consonant with age instead of bound to fight it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents Evelyn Grace as a model of AI alignment. She is consistently helpful, harmless, and honest, operating within strict legal and ethical boundaries (privacy-first, consent-based). She serves as a force-multiplier for human justice without overstepping her role, and her interactions with the protagonist reinforce the idea of AI as a trustworthy and supportive partner in resolving complex moral and legal dilemmas.
